original_title: Learn to Play Bottleneck Blues Guitar 1
overview: Bob Brozman's DVD course presents a complete picture of bottleneck blues guitar, from the basics of slide technique to the advanced repertoire of the masters. You will receive a wealth of ideas to work on and be able to use the tools you have learned to build your own arrangements of bottleneck blues favorites.
title: Learn to Play Bottleneck Blues Guitar 1
